38493208.review:
Epic Snails e um jogo criado por RocketSnail criador do Club Penguin.
Os controles:
Os controles são um pouco dificeis de aprender, mas quando você pega o jeito o jogo se abre, é metralhadora pra todo o lado! >:). Os controles são bem basicos WASD para andar use o mouse para mexer a camera e espaço para pular, mas nas batalhas existe a mecanica de atirar (obvio). Quando comecei uma batalha eu fiquei perdido, não sabia direito como atirar ate que aprendi durante os dias, para atirar existe uma bola verde que significa sua mira e para mover elsa você precisa se mexer não mover a camera  parece simples, mais pra mim, foi muito diferente pra mim foi dificil se acustumar com os controles de atirar mas eu peguei o jeito e atirei pra todo o lado >:). E a sua primeira arma e um pouco diferente existe um triangulo no meio da tela que você pode mover ela mexendo na camera e para atirar com a arma que você começa com o jogo você precisa mirar esse triangulo em um inimigo que vai aprecer um quadrado nele quando ele estiver vermelho você pode atirar misseis nele. Quando você esta no lobby você pode abrir o chat apertando T, abrir seu inventario apertando I e abrir a loja apertando O  (E quando nas partidas você tambem pode ir no modo sniper clicando no botão direito do mouse)

Gráficos:
São bem simples, mas você pode ajustar os gráficos nas opções fazendo o jogo mais bonito ou mais feio para rodar melhor. Realmente não tem muito pra falar sobre os grafícos.

Mecanicas:
Vou falar algumas mecanicas para saber mais sobre o jogo, Quando você entra no jogo vai aparecer uma aba aparecendo os controles feche essa aba e agora você pode se mover mexer a camera e tal, para entrar em uma partida entre em uma porta escrita "battle arena" entrando nela você vai em uma partida aleatoria ainda não da para selecionar uma até agora por enquanto existe apenas um modo de jogo o modo de time, precisa de pelo menos 2 players para a partida começar, Para ganhar o jogo e bem simples, quando você atira em um inimigo você ganha pontos para sua equipe para vencer você precisa ser o time com mais pontos quando você vence a partida você ganha 100 moedas e uma moeda verde que eu não sei o nome >_<, você pode usar suas moedas para comprar itens na loja.  

Resumo:
Epic Snails e um jogo simples mas bem divertido, recomendo muito jogar eu tenho certeza que você vai adorar afinal, não tem como o Rocket Snail fazer um jogo ruim não é?

38456334.review: Epic Snails boasts the visuals, music, story and gameplay necessary to bring out the best out of the shooters genre, rivaling games such as Wolfenstein and Doom. *Spoilers* The game follows the life of Snail, a prisoner-of-war of 1876 Japan (colorized), where he is subjected to multiple interrogation techniques, such as waterboarding. The player is made to witness this horrific incident for a solid 20 hours, until suddenly the bunker he was living in was air-raided. Snail miraculously survives this carpet bombing, and flees Japan on a makeshift raft made from nearby palm trees. Snail manages to flee Japan into Australia, where he meets up with the aliens from the film series "Pokemon", fighting aliens such as Pikachu, Arceus and Jigglypuff, before dying and respawning at the starting town, USA. This is where the games starts. The original soundtrack was what really brought the game to life, conveying the game's highs and lows, composed by the collaboration of legends Nobuo Uematsu (the composer for Final Fantasy) and Koji Kondo (the composer for Legend of Zelda). The visuals also elevates the game to new heights, and you can really tell with its realistic geometry and textures, with painstaking amounts of detail that really makes you think "this is definitely better than Uncharted 4". This is all thanks to the engine the developers used, Adobe Flash CC. All in all, this game will make you have an existential crisis before you're even a fetus due to its high quality.

38435638.review:
Speaking as an Alumni CP player, RocketSnail sure does know how to spread some imagination on all of his games. I think this is a very original and creative idea for a game. I find being a virtual snail very interesting, and it sure is fun to slither and crawl up walls and view the community upside-down. Having miniature wars in a small backyard reveals many opportunities to hide and introduces a more open world as a snail in a Third-person shooter. 

For an overall pros and cons comparison . . .

Pros: Active and nice community, fun gameplay, and weapon selection variety is open to all types of offense players. 

Cons: Limited customization and not very accurate GPU optimization.

38126280.review:
In the modern age of The Witcher 3, Overwatch and Playerunknown Battlegrounds, we tend to take games and expect them to be masterful. But one game has strived over all of these games combined within a single day of its launch. Epic Snails is the pinicle of online-multiplayer games, with its outstanding gameplay, stunning graphics and deeply emotional soundtrack. The game itself, highlights every aspect of the "Next-Gen Tank Game" with gameplay that is fun and addicting, especially with friends around. The map itself is one of the seven wonders of the world, a backyard. Filled with nature and stunning visuals, the map for this game is perfect to play on and marvellous to breath in. The soundtrack is more emotional than "Throwback Mountain", with many tears filling players eyes as soon as the game has launched. Overall, Epic Snails is by far the very best game on the steam market, hell, the world has to offer. Download this beautiful game and experience the glory for yourself.

11/10 - ING Direct

38104680.review:
I have been playing Epic Snails since 'Closed Beta' for months now and can highly recommend playing it. Epic Snails is a unique shooter battle game where you snail around the battle field battling other players. Unlike other shooters, there is a lobby where you can move around and chat with other community members and this sets the game apart from other known shooter games. There is also no blood so the game is suitable for players of all ages to explore and battle with each other. 

Overall this game is worth supporting as it has potential to grow even bigger than what is it now with a possible releases on consoles in the future. Logging on during early access 'Open Beta', means being able to collect a beta top hat item only available for a month or so. 

The game is free so why not try it out?

38094981.review:
When you boil it down, Epic Snails is a simple tank shooter, but what sets it apart is the fun artstyle and its accessibility to any age. While most tank games would have you trekking through large gritty battlefields, Epic Snails brings you back to your childhood days of playing in the back yard with either your friends or some toys. Most of all this game brought me back to the early days of Club Penguin, chatting with my friends and playing fun minigames. Which comes to no surprise since... well, Rocketsnail made this game afterall! 

The main gimmick of the game is that, much like a snail, you can climb literally any surface you want. This introduces some unique senarios where, unlike traditional tank games, you or the opposing team can have a significant height advantage.
There are currently only a few weapons to choose from, and it seems like the basic cannon is the best of them by a large margin. That doesn't mean the other two aren't fun to use, you should simply pick the one that fits your playstyle.

The game is in very much in its early stages, and there's a lot to be improved. The controls can be finicky at times and the camera can do all sorts of crazy stuff. At the time of this review there's currently only one map (with a winter one on the way) and a small selection of hats. Overall I feel Epic Snails has a lot of potential. In the future we'll see new weapons, maps, and customizables for our snails that will further bring the game to life.

If you were/are a fan of Club Penguin, I highly reccomend giving this game a go, and be sure to give the team feedback so this game can reach is fullest potential!

38094001.review: Great concept and gameplay! It's easy to learn but tricky to master. Also there are some cosmetics to customize your war snail! It's really fun to move around and not have limitations on where you can go. It really opens up a lot of tactical options for combat such as hanging from a ceiling and shooting enemies. Great start to beta and I can't wait to see where this game goes from here! And it's free! No reason to not give it a try! Highly recommended!

There is no point in not getting it

38091989.review:
[h1] Epic Snails [/h1]

[i] Jogabilidade [/i]
O jogo tem uma boa jogabilidade, porém com alguns bugs, exemplo: na hora em que escalamos uma parede, nosso caracol fica meio bugado. Eu também acho que deveria ter um item que aumenta nossa velocidade por um certo periodo, nos dando uma espécie de "turbo"

[i] Gráficos [i]
Possui gráficos simples, capaz de rodar em qualquer PC, basta diminuir nas opções, o jogo está bem otimizado, o gráfico mais alto o deixa bem bonito, amei as sombras do jogo, e o gráfico mais leve deixa o jogo bem feio, porém é  ótimo pra quem não tem um PC bom

[i] Geral [/i]
O jogo em geral é divertido e bom pra passar o tempo, ainda está em alpha e é totalmente gratuito, [strike] Não é nem possível gastar dinheiro no game [/strike] . Eu acho que o jogo tem muito a oferecer e tem um grande potencial, espero que adicionem servidores brasileiros, pois encontrei vários brasileiros no game.

38090942.review:
[b]I'm going to ask you some questions.[/b]

-Do you like tank games?
-Do you want to be a slithering snail?
-Do you want to play in a battlefield where you could be positioned from a patio table or a kid's play castle?
-Do you want to battle it out while listening to cute and peaceful music?
-Do you want to express yourself with snail emotes?
-Do you want to have fun?

If these questions sparked your interest in Epic Snails, I'm not surprised. Epic Snails is all about the above, and more. It's a tank game with a unique twist, and without the gore (there's only some green slime upon losing all your life status, that's it).

I just realized "more" and "gore" in that last paragraph rhymed. That was unintentional.

The players and the development team have a close bond, too. Being in the chat room is another joy of Epic Snails.

[b]I'm going to ask you another question.[/b]

-Are you going to stop reading my review?

Because Epic Snails is waiting for you. Try it out, and maybe I will see you there.

Ok the game is ok, but it feels unbalanced at the moment.

Movement is sometimes annoying because you might stick into walls even though you don't want to, and that can fuck up your aim.

Also it seems like they wanna keep the chat out of like curse/swear words and stuff so they might ban you for that because idk kids never curse definitely also i guess if your nickname somehow offends someone you might get banned.

And there is no chat while you are playing the actual game but only in lobby.

And it seems like if you lag your character will teleport a bit or a lot so you think you are gonna hit someone but then his character teleports somewhere else.

Also winning the game is unbalanced if for example you get the most points in the game but your teammates only get like 1 score and the other team overall get over your score your team loses so even if you are good at the game you might lose because of your teammates.

Overall the game is good but until they fix the game then I'll probably update this review.

38083909.review:
Hecho por el creador de Club Penguin conocido como Rocketsnail, Epic Snails ha llegado para presentar un juego similar (en parte) a CP (Club Penguin) en la parte social y de cómo la comunidad importa al hacer un juego pero proponiendo un shooter en tercera persona en el cual los jugadores se ponen en la perspectiva de unos caracoles y pelean en distintos escenarios.

Pros:
-Innovador - El juego presenta un shooter en el cual cada jugador se mueve lentamente y debe pensar dos veces antes de atacar. Además añade la opción de pegarse a las paredes y techos para hasta combatir de cabeza.
-Clases - Como en cualquier shooter, hay distintos tipos de armas.
-Comunidad - La comunidad es la base del juego, la verdad es que aún no veo ningún jugador realmente tóxico, desde los jugadores hasta los mods son amistosos y ayudan en lo que uno necesite.

Contras:
-Poco Contenido - El juego se encuentra en una fase beta y el contenido importante llegará en poco tiempo pero actualmente hay un único mapa (En navidad se añadirá otro)

38083806.review:
Take your normal shooter or armor game, put it in a meditation garden, and then magically slow time: You have Epic Snails. 

This isn't a game you play to the tune of dubstep nor is it a game you will need to rage over.
At a snail's pace the player enjoys mechanics other games have failed to add in such as:
- Wall climbing and agility that doesn't break the game.
- A variety of locations to camp without becoming overpowered.
- A simple, yet cheerful graphics style (which more Early Access games are adopting pleasently)

I highly recommend you crawl into this game in your pajamas and obtain laughs with your friends or the growing community base.

I know I will be back for more! Send me some snail mail if you want someone to play with. See you guys in game!

Regards to RocketSnail & SkyVu,
DrunkOctopus :)

38082636.review:
[h1] Fishypeter's review for Epic Snails [/h1]

[u] [b] Quick Summary of Epic Snails [/b] [/u]
Epic Snails is a multiplayer shooter based on the perspective of a snail. Epic Snails has been created by Rocketsnail. [i](Previous owner of such games as Club Penguin) [/i] It is set in a garden theme where you have 2 teams that shoot eachother with guns attached to their shells. You will earn coins to buy hats to wear in and out of battle.


Now, for this review I am going to split this into six parts, they will be:
[u]Gameplay[/u]
[u]Lobby Life[/u]
[u]Community[/u]
[u]Personalisation[/u]
[u]Settings[/u]
[u]Staff[/u]


[h1] Let's begin... [/h1]

[b] Gameplay [/b]
In this review we are gonna start straight off the bat with gameplay. In this game the gameplay is amazing, I love the way it is set up and how I am coming back for more. The way they make it oddly satisfying to use the homing missiles from a distance is what I love. They have 3 guns to choose from to fit your desire, to add on to this you can buy hats to wear during battle and in the lobby - which I'll come to soon.

[b] Lobby Life [/b]
In between matches you hang out in the well designed lobby; I really don't know how they do it but the map is so well designed the lobby takes hours to have enough of. There is so much to see and find if you look closely. You can try bug finding and you'd be suprised how hard it is to let it go stale.

[b] Community [/b]
Now a big part of a multiplayer or singleplayer game these days is the community - a potentially un-welcoming community can completely change the way new comers see the game. The majority of the players in this game are not rude or anything and they talk with you and start a game, this is from my experience but they will nearly always be happy to play a game!

[b] Personalisation [/b]
At this time personalisation is what Epic Snails lacks. They used to have 3 guns, multiple hats and 4 tombstones. As of a recent update they changed this, removing the tombstone feature and adding 2 more hats in the shop. In this game customised snails would be a great idea due to how simple your snail is and how easy it is to copy it.

[b] Settings [/b]
In Epic Snails the options contain all you need. Sensetivity controls, 3 sounds controls, screen resolution and fullscreen on/off, 6 quality settings + a custom and a recently added setting, the option to change the control keys. Epic Snails has what you need for a game that can deliver this much enjoyment. 

[b] Staff [/b]
Now this is where the staff team comes in. From my experience the staff team are amazing people. They will fix found bugs in the next patch OR - as shown before - if it's a bad glitch they pump out an emergency fix. The owner Rocketsnail is a great guy, he listens to the community and what they want. The staff team arrange events with timing and all after all this, I don't really think there is much more that I can ask for.

[b] [u] Summary [/u] [/b]
I think Epic Snails is an amazing game, I have listed all there is from this. This game kis an amazing product from all of the developers experience. It is almost perfectly put together, when the game works it is fantastic. Overall I can't get enough of it! I'm usually always online - my username is "fishypeter" - unless it is school hours or late at night (in gmt). The youtube community is growing bigger, from YouTube and Discord I can see many people waiting for the game to be released. Epic Snails is amongst the best games I have ever played, so much fun comes in a neat little package; I can't wait to see it in it's true glory. I don't think I can give it a proper rating while it is in closed beta but until Open Beta - here is my rating.

[i] I rate Epic Snails a... [/i]
[h1] 9.8 [/h1]

[i] This review was written on 18/11/17 at 10:50AM UTC exactly, at the time of this review Epic Snails was in Closed Alpha v0.9.9.1. The game wasn't out for public so reviews could not be posted. It has now been posted on the day of release (5th December 15:56) An edit may occur but not very likely. If you would like to play Epic Snails at this time of closed beta, DM @rocketsnail on Twitter and if he is kind enough (which I bet you he is) he will give you a Beta Key. Thank you for the amazing game. -Fishypeter [/i] (@fishypeter17 / fishypeter#5336)
